2.0.0.en: Fixed the flow trigger cards for the forecast so the required day can be selected. Removed Thunder from the forecast as WU is not providing valid data. Changed Pressure to Relative Pressure as that is what WU returns.

2.0.1.en: Fixed the flow trigger cards for the forecast so the required day can be selected. Removed Thunder from the forecast as WU is not providing valid data. Changed Pressure to Relative Pressure as that is what WU returns. UV-Index and Solar Radiation only shown if the data is received.

2.0.2.en: Check for null for missing information so 0 is still reported.

2.1.0.en: Added greater than and equal to flow condition cards for the forecast with selectable days.

2.1.1.en: Fix broken Solar Radiation trigger and added more diagnostics in case the fix does not work.

2.1.4.en: Fixed issue with forecast trigger only working for Today

2.1.5.en: Added extra logging and always log errors

2.1.6.en: Fixed crash when an error is returned for WU

2.1.7.en: Fixed an issue where polling stops after a network error

2.1.8.en: Ensure error message is cleared from the forecast. Initial update is now delayed to ensure app updates don't exceed connection rate.

2.1.9.en: Ensure warning message is cleared from the device. Initial update is now delayed to ensure app updates don't exceed connection rate. Fixed an issue where polling stops after a network error

2.1.10.en: Another attempt at fixing the mysterious crash when the network fails

2.1.11.en: Fixed issues where polling stops after a network error

2.1.13.en: Added an app option to specify the number of weather stations on your account so the update rate can be optimised.

2.1.14.en: Added an app option to specify the wind speed units (Km/H or m/s).

2.1.15.en: Fix probelm with using forcast flow conditions.

2.1.16.en: Fix problem with speed units changing to m/s after update and put default back to Km/H unless already set manually.

2.1.17.en: If the station ID is not found then you now have the option to add it anyway. Adding / removing a station automatically increments / decrements the station count to adjust the polling interval.
